ch0058_00_kahiri/0101_0701_01_10:
Ah, there you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
It looks like the winds are quite pleasant today.
ch0058_00_kahiri/0101_0701_02_10:
I am going to go train.
Would you like to join me?
ch0058_00_kahiri/0601_0701_01_10:
This is a very large city, but it provides so
many convenient services.
ch0058_00_kahiri/0601_0701_02_10:
And even if it is an artificial island, Pasio
would be very attractive to tourists as well.
ch0058_00_kahiri/0601_0701_03_10: My father owns the Hano Grand Hotel.
ch0058_00_kahiri/0601_0701_04_10:
So I am quite confident in my knowledge
of hospitality.
ch0058_00_kahiri/0601_0702_01_10: I know what real hospitality is like.
ch0058_00_kahiri/0601_0702_02_10:
The reason all of the people called to Pasio
seem so happy must be because there is
ample care that goes into their comfort.
ch0058_00_kahiri/0602_0701_01_10: Toucannon has a very large beak.
ch0058_00_kahiri/0602_0701_02_10: I evolved him from a Pikipek I caught in the past.
ch0058_00_kahiri/0602_0701_03_10:
He gracefully flies in the sky, and every time
I’ve gotten stronger, he’s changed his form, too.
ch0058_00_kahiri/0602_0701_04_10:
I have to make sure to stay strong for
Toucannon as well.
ch0058_00_kahiri/0602_0702_01_10:
Pokémon evolve and change their form for
their Trainers.
ch0058_00_kahiri/0602_0702_02_10:
We, as Trainers, must keep moving forward for
them as well!
ch0058_00_kahiri/0603_0701_01_10:
As a professional golfer, I aim to make my
matches entertaining for the spectators.
ch0058_00_kahiri/0603_0701_02_10:
Besides, I enjoy playing the games that the
audience enjoys watching.
ch0058_00_kahiri/0603_0701_03_10:
That’s why I feel the same with Pokémon battles.
We enjoy the battles that others enjoy to watch.
ch0058_00_kahiri/0603_0701_04_10:
However, I get so caught up in the battle
that I don’t pay attention to my surroundings.
I still have a lot to learn.
ch0058_00_kahiri/0603_0702_01_10:
Be it a neck-and-neck battle that makes 
your palms sweat, or one that’s graceful and 
coordinated, there are always highlights.
ch0058_00_kahiri/0603_0702_02_10:
Perhaps it is because they are exceptional
that they stand out so much.
ch0058_00_kahiri/0603_0702_03_10:
Or perhaps they are coincidences 
that only happen because we are 
so caught up in the heat of battle.
ch0058_00_kahiri/0604_0701_01_10:
Oricorio is a Pokémon that changes how it
looks depending on what nectar it sips.
ch0058_00_kahiri/0604_0701_02_10:
And it performs a different dance depending
on what form it has taken.
ch0058_00_kahiri/0604_0701_03_10:
I can’t help but respect it for the vigor with
which it dances.
ch0058_00_kahiri/0604_0702_01_10:
My Oricorio uses Baile Style, so she does an
intense and passionate performance.
ch0058_00_kahiri/0604_0702_02_10:
If you ever get the chance to visit Alola,
I would love to show you in person.
ch0058_00_kahiri/0605_0701_01_10:
Hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Today’s a rest day from training.
ch0058_00_kahiri/0605_0701_02_10:
By taking breaks from time to time, you can
optimize your training. Changing your pace
is important.
ch0058_00_kahiri/0605_0701_03_10: I wonder what I should do on my day off...
ch0058_00_kahiri/0605_0701_04_10: Maybe I should do what I enjoy.
ch0058_00_kahiri/0605_0702_01_10:
I thought about it, and I decided that I like
golfing and Pokémon battles.
ch0058_00_kahiri/0605_0702_02_10: You can do those things on your days off, too!
ch0058_00_kahiri/1701_0701_02_10:
It should be more useful to you.
Please use it well.
ch0058_00_kahiri/1701_0702_01_10: Acquiring new items is important, of course.
ch0058_00_kahiri/1701_0702_02_10:
But what is more important is using them
efficiently and with good timing.
ch0058_00_kahiri/2501_0701_01_10:
It is pointless to just work out 
for long periods of time.
ch0058_00_kahiri/2501_0701_02_10:
It’s because you concentrate while working out
that your experience sticks.
ch0058_00_kahiri/2501_0701_03_10:
That is why I am researching ways in which I
can concentrate during my ten-hour workout.
ch0058_00_kahiri/2501_0701_04_10:
That’s my usual workout time, so I should
be able to get great results.
ch0058_00_kahiri/2501_0702_01_10:
I never want to compromise when it comes
to either golf or Pokémon battles.
ch0058_00_kahiri/2501_0702_02_10:
Be it golf competitions or Pokémon battles, in
order to win, I must be able to
win against myself.
ch0058_00_kahiri/2501_0702_03_10:
I want to be able to meet the expectations
of my golf fans that cheer me on and the
Pokémon that fight alongside me.
ch0058_00_kahiri/2511_0701_02_10:
I would even want to challenge you right here
and right now.
ch0058_00_kahiri/2511_0701_03_10:
But instead, why don’t you try your hand at the
Alola League?
ch0058_00_kahiri/2511_0701_04_10:
I would like to battle you as a member of the
Elite Four.
ch0058_00_kahiri/2511_0701_05_10:
I’m sure you would be able to make it very
far in the league.
ch0058_00_kahiri/2511_0702_01_10: The Alola League is still relatively young.
ch0058_00_kahiri/2511_0702_02_10:
But don’t let that fool you. The Elite Four and
the Champion are genuinely strong.
ch0058_00_kahiri/2511_0702_03_10:
If you seek the greatest of battles, please come
by sometime.
ch0058_00_kahiri/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning.
There’s a wonderful breeze blowing right now!
ch0058_00_kahiri/3002_0701_01_10:
Morning! We’ll miss out on valuable
training time if we don’t get going!
ch0058_00_kahiri/3003_0701_01_10:
Hello there!
Care to join me on the practice range?
ch0058_00_kahiri/3004_0701_01_10:
There’s a nice breeze out there today.
It’s perfect weather for a round of golf.
ch0058_00_kahiri/3005_0701_01_10:
Hello. It feels like time to start my evening
training. Maybe I’ll hit the putting green.
ch0058_00_kahiri/3006_0701_01_10:
Is it night already?
There aren’t enough hours in a day...
